Uses of Interface
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.recipient.Recipient

Packages that use Recipient
Package
Description
com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.recipient
Contains a sealed model hierarchy representing classified message recipients in a Bukkit-based command or messaging context.

  • Uses of Recipient in com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.recipient

    Subinterfaces of Recipient in com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.recipient
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    Recipient.Sendable
    A marker subinterface for Recipient types that are capable of receiving messages directly.
    Classes in com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.recipient that implement Recipient
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    Recipient.Invalid
    Represents an invalid or unrecognized message recipient.
    static final record 
    Recipient.Proxied
    Represents a proxied command sender (e.g., from another plugin or dispatch chain).
    static final record 
    Recipient.Valid
    Represents a valid, recognized message recipient such as a player, console, or command block.
    Methods in com.winterhavenmc.library.messagebuilder.models.recipient that return Recipient
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Recipient
    Recipient.of(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
    Factory method that analyzes the given CommandSender and returns a categorized Recipient instance.
